Functions
canConfigureRfsensor

Returns a boolean to indicate whether to calibrate rfsensor or not.  The funciton will wait until character pops up into stream.

Returns

a boolean that represents whether to configure rfsensor or not

set_first_corridor

Sets the first corridor before zumo starts

initialise_variables

Sets up initial values for variables

initialise_wire

Begin wire connection

initialise_serial

Initialise Serial

initialise_compass

Initialises compass for the Zumo

initialise_rfsensor

Initialise reflectance sensors for Zumo
